meanings.definition: The quality or state of being portly; stoutness or heaviness in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her portliness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The man's portliness was evident in his round face and large belly.
meanings.sent3: Despite her portliness, she moved gracefully on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The portliness of the old oak tree gave it a majestic presence in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The portliness of the ship made it seem like a floating fortress on the sea.

meanings.definition: The condition of being overweight or obese.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised him to watch his diet to reduce his portliness.
meanings.sent2: Her portliness was a result of years of unhealthy eating habits.
meanings.sent3: Despite his portliness, he had a cheerful disposition that brightened the room.
meanings.sent4: The portliness of the cat made it a prime candidate for a weight loss program.
meanings.sent5: The portliness of the bear indicated a successful season of foraging for food.
